post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Negotiable – no cap. Benefits excellent, this is for one of the 4 big banks, company name confidential for now.

http://www.gurulink.ca/jobview.asp?JobID=1839

QUESTIONS

1) How many years of .Net development experience do you have?

2) How many years development experience do you have with Oracle and/or SQL Server?

3) Outline your experience with Access Controls, including integrating security into applications.

4) Do you have any experience with workflow engines such as Pega, Windows Workflow Foundation, SalesForce.com or Oracle?

5) What salary rate are you looking for to make your next move?

6) This job is based in Down town TORONTO, are you willing/able to commute to this location?

7) What is the best phone number to reach you on during business hrs?

Nick Makata
Recruitment Consultant

Email: nick@gurulink.ca Web: www.gurulink.ca
post.title: SOLUTION DEVELOPER (.Net)
